html:
Today, Google Cloud announced a first-of-its-kind Generative AI Leader certification program. It’s specifically designed for non-technical professionals like managers, strategists and leaders to give them a foundational understanding of AI and how it’s used.

Participants will learn in-demand skills for working with AI, get hands-on with Google Cloud’s Gen AI products, and learn how to drive organizational change. Our research shows that more than 80% of people with a Google Cloud certification say the credential opens doors to new career opportunities and accelerates their paths to promotion.*

You can prepare for this certification with Google Cloud's free collection of courses.

Learn more on the Google Cloud blog.

*Google/Ipsos, Cloud Learning Services Market Pulse, Fielded Sept 17th - October 23rd 2024 (US, UK, FR, DE, IN, BR, MX, JP, AU/NZ)
